name: Five Night's At Freddy's 1 RCTD
description:
Just a recreation of the 1st game of Five Night's At Freddy's, but at the GDevelop Engine.

I hope you like.

CREDITS:

All credits to this game go to Scott Cawthon.

Five Night's At Freddy's is a registered trademark of Scott Cawthon.

Remade by KatePrises.

If you like this game, buy the original game in the store:

Original Store Page.
